scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages:sequential: npm run build --workspace=@moneed/utility-types && npm run build --workspace=@moneed/utils && npm run build --workspace=@moneed/auth && npm run build --workspace=@moneed/db
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=apps/kakao-proxy-server
scripts.build:web: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
scripts.build:kakao: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/kakao-proxy-server
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps:parallel
scripts.build:apps:parallel: npm run build --workspace=apps/web & npm run build --workspace=apps/kakao-proxy-server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps
scripts.clean:packages: npm run clean --workspace=@moneed/utility-types && npm run clean --workspace=@moneed/utils && npm run clean --workspace=@moneed/auth && npm run clean --workspace=@moneed/db
scripts.clean:apps: npm run clean --workspace=apps/web && npm run clean --workspace=apps/kakao-proxy-server
